messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Shirley
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the good wishes! We had a great time and partied hardy (rare for us!) Shirley PS.) Thanks to the cats too for typing for you! =:0 ... thoughts
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the good wishes! We had a great time and partied hardy (rare for
us!)

Shirley

PS.) Thanks to the cats too for typing for you! =:0


> ***HAPPY*** 20th Shirley and dh ... and ... MANY *HAPPY* RETURNS :)
>
> Pris ~> OOOooooooooooOOOOOOOOOOooooooooooOOOOOOOOOO (blowing happy
thoughts
> your way today) <G>
> WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
> have learned how to type ...
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Shirley A Richardson-McCourt" <thediva@...>
> To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, September 06, 2000 7:27 AM
> Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 765
> >
> > I am black, my husband is white, and we are celebrating our 20th ann.
> today!
> > And most of the picture perfect couples who were so sure we were doomed
> have
> > since divorced.
> >
> > Shirley
> >
>
>
